kamaththa nomathiwa wiwahawimata balakirime adahasin dahasaya hawiridi bala wayaskara tharuniyak apaharanaya kota dushanaya kirime adhichodanawata warada piligath withthikaruwan dedenakuta daduwam saha dada niyama kala galla mahadhikarana winisuru ke bi ke hirimbauregama mahatha dushanayata lakwu tharuniyata rupiyal laksha hatharaka wandiyak gewana lesa niyoga kaleya.mese daduwam niyama karana ladde katudampe withanage diksan anil upendrakumara saha wayihena liyanage sunil yana withthikaruwan dedenataya.kamaththa nomathiwa wiwaha kirimata bala kirime adahasin ho nithi wirodhi sansargayakata pelambaawima sadaha apaharanaya kirime chodanawata withthikaruwan dedenatama rupiyal pahalos dahasa bagin dada saha rupiyal lakshaya bagin wandi gewimatada niyama kala mahadhikarana winisuruwaraya dada nogewanne nam masa haya bagin sira daduwamda wandiya nogewanne nam wasara baginda sira daduwamda niyama kaleya.sthri dushana chodanawata palamu wani withthikaru wana katudampe withanage diksan anil upendra kumarata barapathala wada sahitha wasara dekaka sira daduwamak saharupiyal rupiyal wisi dahasaka dadayakda dushanayata lakwu tharuniyata rupiyal laksha dekaka wandiyak gewimata niyama kota ema sira daduwama wasara dahayakata athhitawanu labiya.dadaya nogewanne nam thawath masa hayaka sira daduwamakda wandiya nogewanne nam thawath wasara dekaka sira daduwamakda withthikaruwanta niyama wiya.
